altTitles.ja: 愛の言葉をうらがえし

description.en:
1: Before Saying That It Is Love; On A Certain Sunday  
A kind man, Suda Masayoshi, met a middle school brat, Hasegawa Souma, when he moved into his new house. Because of Souma's complicated background, Masayoshi decided to take Souma in and raised him.   
  
2: Don't Cry, My Little Lamb  
Two years later, the high-schooler Souma confesses his love to Masayoshi. A cute little puppy turned into a horny wolf, how will our dear Masayoshi handle Souma?  
  
3: Reversal Of Love Talk: Anri Story  
Long-time lovers Anri and Satoshi have hit a rough patch. Anri's insecurities and jealousy grow everyday. Will these two survive their troubles, or is it time to call it quits?  
  
4: Reversal Of Love Talk - Satoshi Story  
Anri wants to end his relationship with Satoshi. What might the reason be? And how will Satoshi get him back?  
  
5: Anata wo Matsu no (I Will Wait For You)  
High-school student Kengo is pretty miserable when his girlfriend dumps him right before Christmas. Trying to keep his mind occupied by working at his family's bar, he finds himself thrown in with regular drinker Nishizawa, whose kindness soothes Kengo.   
  
6: Uncontrolled Puberty  
Shuuto's attempts to control his feelings for his older brother's friend Yukihiro are failing miserably. No matter what he tries, the high school student can't stop fantasizing about his long time crush. But Yukihiro has no intention of letting Shuuto avoid him forever…  
  
7: Passion Recycle  
8-page short story about a sexually molesting shop owner and the employee who puts up with it.  
  
8: Honey  
8-page short story about a student trying to hide a secret crush from his overly affectionate best friend.
